titlestmt.titleproper: Smith-Houston-Ogden family papers. George and Mary Smith family papers (series 70) 1829-1915 1820s-1870s
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: Smith-Houston-Ogden family papers. George and Mary Smith family papers (series 70)

bioghist.p: Dr. George Smith (1804-1882) was the son of Benjamin H. Smith and the husband of Mary Lewis Smith (1808-1892). Margaretta Smith, George Smith, Jr., and Clement L. Smith were their children. Mary and George Smith were the grandparents of Lawrence M.C. Smith, husband of Eleanor Houston Smith.

scopecontent.p: This collection includes items related to various members of the Smith family. Materials include:diaries; marriage certificate of George and Mary Smith; a history notebook belonging to Mary Smith Wood; herbarium belong to Margaretta Smith; letters to Margaretta Smith; letters to George Smith, Jr.; certificates of merit; and photographs.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
